column4: I have trouble with updating to 10.10, after install and restart, in the login screen it won't ask for user/psw
hello, can someone help me?
What does the screen say?
nothing, only the background image and mouse
i tried the no-fail boot but wont work either
Try installing 10.04 instead
....and wait until 10.10 stabilizes.
how can I go back to 10,04%
(There are other options, of course, but...) Download 10.04; install it; use it. When 10.10 has stabilized, upgrade.
if I install 10.04 would I lose data?
Not if you back it up first.
Did you start out with 10.10 or did you upgrade?
I upgraded from 10.04
So, you're telling me failsafe doesn't work eitiher, yes?
exact, in the menu I tried dpkg, but didn't seem to access internet
k
so no easy way to fix the problem? I thought it would be easy to upgrade to 10.10, I was wrong
I can access the console, but I'm not a linux geek
Did you backup your data before upgrading?
no
but I could now I guess
I would encourage you to backup data *before* upgrading your OS.
